Content.Text:
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm glad you came, <MYNAME>!
Would you like to try playing the tune
<RED>"The Basic Scale"</RED>?
Play
Don't play

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay!
Just hit the notes I tell you in order
with your hammer!
<PAGE>
<RED>The Basic Scale</RED> notes are
<RED>Do</RED> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <GREEN>Fa</GREEN>
<L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <PURPLE>Do</PURPLE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up?
Ready to stop playing?
Tell me the tune again
Quit playing

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, I'll tell you again!
Just hit the notes I tell you in order
with your hammer!
<PAGE>
The <RED>basic scale</RED> notes are
<RED>Do</RED> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <GREEN>Fa</GREEN>
<L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <PURPLE>Do</PURPLE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Play faster!
Don't be such a slowpoke!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up?
Do you want to quit playing?
Continue playing
Quit playing

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now I want you to play faster!
Just hit the notes I tell you in order
with your hammer!
<PAGE>
The <RED>basic scale</RED> notes are
<RED>Do</RED> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <GREEN>Fa</GREEN>
<L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <PURPLE>Do</PURPLE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You played it wrong!
Come on, try it again from the top!
Try playing again
Quit playing

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, concentrate!
<PAGE>
The <RED>basic scale</RED> notes are
<RED>Do</RED> <ORANGE>Re</ORANGE> <Y_GREEN>Mi</Y_GREEN> <GREEN>Fa</GREEN>
<L_BLUE>So</L_BLUE> <BLUE>La</BLUE> <PINK>Ti</PINK> <PURPLE>Do</PURPLE>!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Awww! If you decide you want to play it
some time, come see me!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hee-hee-hee-hee.
You hit the right notes!
Great performance!
<PAGE>
So we're going to give you a prize!
Go ahead, Aaron!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Right!
<PAGE>
The prize you get this time is the
ability to use the <RED>bouncy mushroom</RED>
found in the lower part of the forest.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll smash open this rock for you!
Hiyaaah!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now you can use this <RED>bouncy mushroom</RED>!
<PAGE>
When you jump onto this mushroom, it
will send you flying to a distant place!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
After you've flown with the bouncy
mushroom, jump in the hole in the stump
to return to where you were before!
<PAGE>
Give it a try later!

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't that cool, <MYNAME>?
Now you can get around the forest much
more easily!

<FACE_KORO2><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'll let you know when I think of a new
tune.
I'm sure you'll be waiting eagerly!
